this won't work on my r4 for ds lite! any help?
Works on my R4-SDHC kernel version 1.32b

@ Sepenttooth 
It does work on the r4 cards for DS lite. Just install the wood firmware on it, instead of the regular one. 
Be sure to get the version which supports this game (think it is 1.23 or 24)
Thanks, that was a big help!
